com.uce.userlab.haptics.motion.interfaces
Interface Player

All Known Implementing Classes:
BasicPlayer
public interface Player

This Interface layout the default set of players methods and behavours that all complete implementations of a good Player should have. All players that are developed and delivered with this toolkit will implement this interface

Field Summary
static int COORDINATE_1D
          Sets the player to play a single dimension of the haptic device
static int COORDINATE_2D
          Sets the player to play two dimensions of the haptic device
static int COORDINATE_3D
          Sets the player to play three dimensions of the haptic device
static int X
          Sets the co-ordinate to be played to be X
static int X_Y
          Sets the co-ordinates to be played to be X and Y
static int X_Y_Z
          Sets the co-ordinates to be played to be X, Y and Z
static int X_Z
          Sets the co-ordinates to be played to be X and Z
static int Y
          Sets the co-ordinate to be played to be Y
static int Y_Z
          Sets the co-ordinates to be played to be Y and Z
static int Z
          Sets the co-ordinate to be played to be Z

setCoOrdinateSystem

void setCoOrdinateSystem(int parameter)
Sets the Co-ordinate system.

Parameters:
parameter - The Identifier provided by interface that indicates the Co-ordinate System you wish, see:
  • COORDINATE_1D
  • COORDINATE_2D
  • COORDINATE_3D

  • X

  • Z

  • X_Z
  • Y_Z

Returns the maxium force to use
